name: dermoi!
description:
The world’s first mobile advanced skincare service, bringing cosmeceutical grade facials & chemical peels to you wherever and whenever you want them.

Our platform enables customers around London (zone one and two) to book a facial treatment in the comfort of your home. You just need to select your desired treatment, and we will send a therapist to you.

team.name: Lucas Citron
team.bioHtml: I am a social media and paid social media expert with extensive growth hacking skills, marketing experience and know-how of taking businesses to the next level

jobs.title: Designer / Social Media Driven
jobs.description:
dermoi! is a revolutionary skincare service - our mobile platform is the first of its kind dedicated solely to clinical skincare services, using best-in-class treatments and technology to provide results-driven skincare to clients in the comfort of their home. We are collaborating with some of the most effective, clinically-proven cosmeceutical brands in the world to deliver results-driven treatments to our clients in London. We are a fast-growing, ambitious, young beauty tech business. Dermoi! House is located three minutes’ walk from Victoria mainline and tube stations.

If you love design, social media and want a new position that encourages you to push the boundaries, then this is definitely for you! ABOVE EVERYTHING we are looking for a SELF DRIVEN, SOLUTIONS DRIVEN person! This is an exclusive opportunity in a fast growing company based in Central London!

A fantastic opportunity has opened up for a talented, energetic Junior Designer which has PASSION for Social Media as well, to showcase their flair and passion in producing highly engaging assets for both digital and print + everything that's digital. This role represents an opportunity to join the team and be part of our fast-paced journey, helping us maintain and develop our reputation within the online community.

Job Description:

In this Junior Designer/Social Media role, you will support with print and digital design. Your role will involve you creating visually stunning and engaging assets to help us promote the company and services, on social media, events and popups/print advertising.
To be successful in this role you will need to have a strong CAN DO attitude, experience using the Adobe Creative Suite, as you will be required to create exceptional visual content. You will be joining a small but friendly team of hardworking and talented individuals. You will need to be a keen and proactive team player, who is happy to roll their sleeves up and get stuck into any design challenge or task.

What are we looking for:

Experience with Adobe Suite - Photoshop, Video Editor, etc.
Energetic & ideas driven
Designing adverts and advertorials
Designing for web and social media
Assisting in managing website content
Email marketing assistance
Assisting with influencer marketing management
E-commerce maintenance
Communicating thoroughly across all departments to ensure productivity and efficiency
Participating in product development
The Admin Bits:

09:00 - 18:00 but flexibility is a must
25 days holiday per year, plus usual UK public holidays
3-month probationary period
1 week's notice period during the probationary period, 4 weeks thereafter
Statutory employer pension contribution
Discretionary bonus
Starting salary £18,000 to £24,000 depending upon experience
Location: Victoria, London

All this means strong organisational and communication skills are essential to the role.

To apply, please send your CV, and a letter outlining why you should be considered for the role. Please include within your letter your current notice period and availability.

For more information about dermoi! please visit, www.dermoi.com

Job Type: Full-time
